com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IPage

All Superinterfaces:
IPageViewFactory
public interface IPage
extends IPageViewFactory

A class implements IPage to indicate that it is both a page object and a page view factory. Page objects are pages of report archives that can be rendered in some type of format.

The following explains the operations you can perform on an IPage / IPageView object:

  • Since an IPage object is also a page view factory, check if the page view object can be resized. If it can be resized, set the page dimensions.
    IPageView pageViewObj = IpageObj.createView();
    if (pageViewObj  instanceof  IResize) {
    IResize resizeObj = (IResize) pageViewObj;
    resizeObj.setSize(destWidth, destHeight) ;
    }

  • Check if the page view object can be rotated. If it can be rotated, set the angle of rotation.
    if (pageViewObj  instanceof  IRotate) {
    IRotate rotateObj = (IRotate) pageViewObj;
    rotateObj.setRotation(RotAngle) ;
    }

  • Create an output stream where the page is to be rendered.
    outputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();

  • Check if the page can be rendered in this output format and call renderToStream.
    if (pageViewObj.supportsRenderFormat(RenderFormatType.SVG))
    pageViewObj.renderToStream(outputStream, RenderFormatType.SVG) ;

getRenderedPageHeightInPixels

public int getRenderedPageHeightInPixels()
                                  throws PageNotRenderedException
Returns the page's rendered height in pixels as a value. If the value is zero and this is not a text or ALF page, a PageNotRenderedException is thrown.

If this is a text page or an ALF page, a value of zero is returned. Unlike other graphical page types, text and ALF pages are not rendered in pixels, and therefore cannot return a positive value for rendered height in pixels.

Do not call this method until you verify that a call to the IPageView's renderToStream()method has been made; otherwise, a PageNotRendered exception is thrown.

PageNotRenderedException

getRenderedPageScale

public int getRenderedPageScale()
Returns the page's rendered scale percentage.

Returns:
scale percentage, 0 if an error has occurred.

getRenderedPageWidthInPixels

public int getRenderedPageWidthInPixels()
                                 throws PageNotRenderedException
Returns the page's rendered width in pixels as a value. If the value is zero and this is not a text or ALF page, a PageNotRenderedException is thrown.

If this is a text page or an ALF page, a value of zero is returned. Unlike other graphical page types, text and ALF pages are not rendered in pixels, and therefore cannot return a positive value for rendered width in pixels.

Do not call this method until you verify that a call to the IPageView's renderToStream()method has been made; otherwise, a PageNotRendered exception is thrown.

PageNotRenderedException
